data.name: Algorand Wallet
data.summary: Manage Algorand accounts with MetaMask, transfer, swap, and interact with Algorand dapps.

data.name: app.walletchat.fun üí¨
data.summary: Wallet-to-wallet chat notifications via WalletChat.fun.

data.name: Casper Manager
data.summary: Sign deploys and messages for the Casper Blockchain with your Casper account(s).

data.name: Wallet Guard
data.summary: Protect your crypto with transaction insights and proactive security alerts.

data.name: Push V1
data.summary: Push Snap is a powerful tool that allows any wallet address to receive notifications directly in MetaMask.

data.name: Identify
data.summary: A Snap for managing Decentralized Identifiers(DIDs).

data.name: Blockfence
data.summary: Blockfence transaction insights.

data.name: Kleros Scout
data.summary: A Snap that retrieves contract metadata from the Kleros Curate registries.

data.name: Tezos Wallet
data.summary: Tezos Wallet for MetaMask.

data.name: MinaPortal
data.summary: Interact with Mina protocol using MetaMask.

data.name: Arweave Wallet
data.summary: Access Arweave through MetaMask and interact with Arweave dapps.

data.name: Zion
data.summary: Manage your Bitcoin with MetaMask.

data.name: StarkNet
data.summary: The Starknet Snap allows users to deploy Starknet accounts, make transactions on Starknet, and interact with Starknet smart contracts.

data.name: UniPass
data.summary: A Snap for stablecoin payment.

data.name: Threat Intel
data.summary: Protect yourself from hacking, spamming, and phishing.

data.name: Forta
data.summary: Transaction insights from Forta's database of known scammers.

data.name: Tenderly TX Preview
data.summary: Preview transactions before sending them on-chain to get valuable insights, avoid failed transactions, and save funds. Get human-readable information on transferred assets with corresponding dollar values for ERC-20 tokens and NFTs.

data.name: Assets Risk Detection
data.summary: Detect risks of user assets with GoPlus Security.

data.name: Solana Wallet
data.summary: Manage Solana-based tokens and NFTs, swap, stake, bridge from EVM to SOL, and connect to Solana apps with MetaMask.

data.name: Aptos Wallet
data.summary: Manage Aptos-based tokens and NFTs, swap, stake and connect to Aptos apps with MetaMask.

data.name: Sui Wallet
data.summary: Manage Sui-based tokens and NFTs, stake and connect to Sui apps with MetaMask.

data.name: Vega Protocol
data.summary: MetaMask Snap for interacting with the Vega Protocol.

data.name: Masca
data.summary: Snap for managing DIDs, VCs, and VPs in MetaMask.

data.name: Leap Cosmos Wallet
data.summary: Securely manage keys, connect to Cosmos dapps, and sign transactions.

data.name: Web3 Security
data.summary: Integrates BEI Risk Scores into MetaMask.

data.name: Rarime
data.summary: Safely holds any of your credentials and allows you to prove your identity without revealing any personal data. Powered by Rarimo Protocol and Zero-Knowledge Proof technology.

data.name: Partisia Blockchain
data.summary: Snap to interact with Partisia Blockchain.

data.name: Saferoot
data.summary: Safeguard your crypto and NFTs.

data.name: EthSign Keychain
data.summary: Encrypted password manager.

data.name: Connect by Drift
data.summary: An open-sourced Solana Snap that allows MetaMask users to natively interact with Solana applications.

data.name: Sign in with XMTP
data.summary: Use the ‚ÄúSign in with XMTP‚Äù MetaMask Snap to securely and conveniently sign in to any web app built with XMTP.

data.name: CubeSigner
data.summary: CubeSigner is a hardware-backed, non-custodial platform for securely managing cryptographic keys. The CubeSigner Snap uses the CubeSigner TypeScript SDK to let your MetaMask users sign transactions on EVM-based chains like Ethereum, Avalanche, and Polygon, and on non-EVM chains like Bitcoin and Solana.

data.name: Cosmos Extension
data.summary: Cosmos Extension that adds Cosmos support to MetaMask.

data.name: ShapeShift Multichain
data.summary: The ShapeShift Multichain snap evolves your wallet to support 11 chains in one snap, including Bitcoin, Dogecoin, Litecoin, Cosmos, Binance Chain, Bitcoin Cash, THORChain, Osmosis, and Secret Network.

siteMetadata.title: MetaMask Snaps Directory
siteMetadata.description: Explore community-built Snaps to customize your web3 experience via our official directory.
siteMetadata.author: MetaMask
